articles.description: Bobby Miller pitched six scoreless innings for a second consecutive start, and the Dodgers offense broke out to rout the Phillies on Saturday. Andre Jackson helped rest the other relievers heading into Sunday’s bullpen game.
articles.content: Bobby Miller continues to provide the salve to alleviate the Dodgers pitching wounds, providing six more scoreless innings on Saturday afternoon to beat the Phillies 9-0 at Citizens Bank Park in Phil… [+4909 chars]

articles.title: Marquez and Bagnaia's heated exchange | 2023 #ItalianGP - MotoGP
articles.description: At it again 😱Things got HEATED at the end of Q2 between Marc Marquez and Pecco Bagnaia 💥#ItalianGP 🇮🇹____________________________________________________...
